casebody.data:
Stan MICIURA, Plaintiff/Counterdefendant-Appellee,
v.
Stacy KURC, John Kurc, and 1410 Sycamore, Wyandotte, MI 48192, LLC, Defendants/Counterplaintiffs-Appellants. SC: 156711
COA: 338945 Supreme Court of Michigan. June 27, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the September 21, 2017 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
